lenders.name: Sophie
lenders.loan_because: This is a fabulous way to come together, learn more about each other and share our world.
lenders.occupational_info: I write nature programmes for TV.

lenders.name: Michael Six
lenders.loan_because:
Mahatma Gandhi said it best "be the change you want to see in the world."

I live within abundance and share it with the world.

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the empowerment of people.  God has blessed me greatly in my life, and by his grace I would like to play a part in creating opportunities for others.

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.loan_because: Microcredits to female entrepreneurs is one of the most effective and promising ways to empower women and fight poverty around the world.

lenders.name: FRANCES ANNE
lenders.loan_because: I need to start a business .2years ago i got breastcancer and i lost my job. I am married with 3 children and they all go to school, so my new bussiness will help supplement for my medication and upkeep.
lenders.occupational_info: none

lenders.name: Sanjay
lenders.occupation: They all me the king of spin!
lenders.loan_because: It is important to give. The day we stop giving, is the day that we loose the natural ability to give. I give for very selfish reasons! I give because it makes me a better person, it helps me to remain a positive, energetic and happy human being. I give because we all should give sometimes, and as cliched as it may sound, we gain as much from the giving as the person who recieves.
lenders.occupational_info:
My work? Wow that is a long and boring desciption that I really am not going to inflict on you!

Instead I would like to thank Ben over at Enigin for showing me this website, I hadn't heard of it before, and it is really excellent. I look forward to being able to use it to donate.

lenders.name: Natasha
lenders.loan_because: I believe in my sisters overseas and pray that they may know that there are people all over the world who believe in them and a God in heaven who wants to support and love them them!

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: Having worked for various charities over time, I personally think that it is incredibly important not only to give less fortunate communities funding but also give them the personal chance to improve their living circumstances. This is one of the best and most effective ways that I have found online to be able to do this. I think that every person has something to contribute to the world economy, and this enables people who may not have previously had the chance to be able to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: Publishing is really great and quite self-explanatory, but my other passion is art work. I really enjoy technically drawing as well as creating images for authors and am illustrating a series of children's books right now. I think that this and publishing balance each other out quite well and I am always excited to go to work, no matter what it is I am doing that day!

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do and the way forward for global cooperation ( yes I am naive)
lenders.occupational_info: supporting the learning of 16+ yr olds who have mild learning difficulties.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because:
it is important I guess. I have to be honest, I'm not very good at all the philosophical stuff. I don’t really read that stuff, and I’ve never really got it. What I understand, is what is real and in front of me. If there is someone who can show me otherwise I will listen. I know that there is a lot that I don’t know. This isn’t really making any sense is it? Look, I’ve never been good at writing these things. Basically I’m donating because this makes sense to me. People across the globe can use what is a small amount of money to me and build their entire lives around it? This seems brilliant to me. So I’m going to chip some money in and hope that it does some good to some people that I don’t know and will never meet. I don’t need to meet them to want to help them, I think that simply being shown it and actually being given a chance to do something is really good. I find the news a little depressing, you are shown loads of rubbish that is happening out there in the world but you are offered no way of doing anything about it. Here at least here we are given the option to help. 

I guess that is all I mean when I say “what is in front of me”. I am just a very practical person. This Kiva seems like a good practical solution to a world problem. I want to get behind that in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I get to make cool and funky images, and I get paid for it! When I am not doing that I am doing alot of coding and building.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: simple recognition that my opportunites are not everyone's
lenders.occupational_info: always fun

lenders.name: Pierre-Alain
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people
lenders.occupational_info: Business Development for Asset Management company in Switzerland.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because:
its good to give. It is really good to give. I am lucky to live in a country where I have never been truely poor. I'm not saying that I was born into a "rich" family or anything, but what I can say is that fundementally I never had to struggle to eat. I have never been in a position where I have wondered if I am going to be able to afford to put food in my mouth at night. This is why I am priveilidged. 
I give because it is both helping others to achieve what I have always had, and because it reminds me of how lucky I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I love my work. I love what I do and the people that I get to work with. As I said, I am a very luck man.

lenders.occupational_info: I am business entrepreneur with 3 companys, two in Sweden and one in Morocco. Business is my life.

lenders.name: Rodney Howard
lenders.loan_because:
What God Wants Us to Hear by Rodney Howard Browne

Put simply, stick with the evangelizing plan God has sure to praise and use. Don't try and be so creative and adorable that folks miss the truth. No need for unintelligible and crazy substitutes that entertain but barely convict the lost and edify the saved. Will you notice something here? This exhortation isn't addressed to the hearer, it's for the spokesman. 

The person that is to do that's the one exclaiming the message. Be ready to do it in season and out of season. Don't get on up and begin with an apology that you didn't quite have sufficient time to prepare. 

That doesn't wash." And do so faithfully when it's convenient and when it's not. Sadly , in a shocking number of churches today, God's people are being told what they have to hear rather than what they have to hear. A watered-down gospel may attract gigantic crowds ( for some considerable time ), but it has no never-ending impact. I can't say I have been capable of finding any place in the Scriptures where God expresses the least bit of doubt for drawing numbers. 

Enjoyable the curious itching ears of our postmodern audiences is an exercise in futility. 

Frankly , I'm going to resume doing exactly that, by God's grace, until the day He calls me home. And I think there is a fast-increasing number of supporters who long for nutritive messages based on the Word of the Lord Almighty not human standpoint. The world urgently needs more Christians with the fervor and faith of Paul. Will you be one of them? Will you reply the charge? If this is the case there's no better time than now to start.

lenders.name: Nikolay
lenders.loan_because: I borrow money because it’s necessary to sustain and enlarge the business project for dilution quail’s farms.
lenders.occupational_info:
The business plan for development quail’s farms for $8-10 thousand

Situation
Quail’s eggs - valuable, even a medical product. They contain a lot of vitamins and trace substances even when cholesterol is absent completely. Quails "have won" popularity abroad long time ago where their eggs use not only in the culinary and medical purposes but also as raw materials in perfumery production.
Quail’s farming - profitable and prospective business. But everyone can’t achieve the success in this, because much depends on ability and your own desires to work. After all caring about quails is completely manual labor. 
  Production
All domestic quail’s farming specialize on dilution for oviparous and meat breeds. To oviparous quail’s breeds concern mottled, British black, white English. To meat breeds concern Pharaohs, American broilers. Many quail- fancier multiply Japanese quails.
Quail’s cultivation is very profitable business. Profitability of quail’s production reaches 50-70 %. It is necessary to notice, that turnover of quail’s-farming business also s very high. The female quail reaches productive age for 30-40 days and for a year bears more than 280 eggs.
The competition in our business is small. I consider, that today the market is not filled in quail’s production absolutely. Considering, that quail’s eggs and meat win more and more popularity at the population. It is possible to speak boldly about a big prospects of this business.
How to begin?
If you want enter the market, you will be recommended to begin with 700-1 000 quails. Thanks to fruitfulness the livestock of the feathery can already be enlarged to 5 000 individuals in a year .      Completely equipped hen house(with 700-1 000 female quails) will manage in $8-10 thousand. 
But in 6-9 months of work it is possible to cover all expenses.
 It is possible to purchase eggs or young stock in any reacting economy. An average price of one hatchable egg is $0,10-0,15. The female quail of three-week age will cost about $1,3-2,5.
 It is necessary to consider, that efficiency of quails at the age of one year decreases in twice. Therefore it is necessary to care of herd innovation regularly. For this purpose parent herd have to be formed and contained, where for one male quail there are three-four females. Egg for sort continuation take from two - a ten-month auk. One year-old quails hammer for meat. 
 To trade with young growth is not less profitable, than with quail’s eggs and meat. There are new farms which support demand for quails in the country with an enviable persistence.
 The equipment
 For containing adults it is more convenient use cells from a welded metal grid. There on farms are established the cellular batteries consisting of six cells, equipped with drinking bowls and feeders, small sides for "catching" eggs. In such cellular battery it is possible to place 240-280 quails.
 In the West it is possible to buy any special equipment for the keeping and breeding quails without problems. In Ukraine such cells you must do by yourself. All cells for the keeping quails, and also incubators established on domestic farms are self-made. 
 If you have no possibility or desire to make cell by yourself, you can order it on the farms that attended some years to breeding quails. And one of this cellular battery  from six cells costs near $120-150. Also there is a necessity to establish incubators which are important to increase livestock and regenerate herd. The cost of such incubator is $630-1630(for 1 300-9 000 eggs).
 The accommodation
 For the keeping of 700-1 000 adult-quails I will be enough a little room the area of which is 15-20 sq.m. For the keeping of chickens and young stock the additional room with area about 5 sq.m. And incubators, storage and preparation of feedstuff need an auxiliary premise with the area of 10 sq.m. Of course it is necessary to remember about dilating because at the normal keeping yours 700-1 000 female quails in a year will turn to 5 000.
Food supply
First of all for preparation of own feed mixture it’s necessary to have a shucker. The shucker costs about $110. Feedstuff costs  about $225-325 for tonne.
  Sales
 Most of quail’s eggs is selling in the markets and supermarkets, a quail’s carcass deliver mainly in restaurants. But, considering dietary and even medical properties of quail’s eggs, it is possible to try to adjust their sales in a rest houses, kindergartens, sanatoriums and on camp sites. While wholesale market of quail’s meat won’t be generated, the majority of farms delivers their production directly in retail points. One kg of quail’s meat costs $5-8,5. The storage time of quail’s eggs is sufficiently great (in room temperature eggs can store near 30 days, in a fridge near 60 days). For the same reason there are quite attainable markets not only a native city, but also in a nearby settlements.
